title: Ban system
body:
My friend got banned for being "unsportsmanlike" in chat for 2 games, shouldn't you get chat restricted for that instead of 14 days ban?
I've been chat restricted twice cuz of being toxic in chat

replies.body: Depends on what exactly was said, and there's a pretty good chance he did actually go through the normal punishment escalation steps. If not, keep in mind that some things can make you skip levels of punishment depending on the context of what was said.
if he was suspended then he was probably already chat restricted already prior to the suspension.
